mapper.select: select p.post_no as postNo, p.post_title as postTitle, p.post_progress as postProgress,concat(rpad(p.post_content,20,'.'),'..')as postContent, to_char(p.post_date,'yy-mm-dd am hh:mi:ss')as postDate, m.member_name as postWriter, m.member_picture as pWriterImg, pr.pro_title as proName, pr.pro_no as proNo from post p join member m on(p.post_writer=m.member_no) join project pr on(p.post_pro_no=pr.pro_no) where p.POST_PRO_NO in(select pro_no from work_on where member_no=#{memberNo}) order by p.post_no desc
